auth.welcome.subtitle: Smart and convenient electric vehicle battery swap solution
guide.step1: Find nearby battery swap stations on map or list
guide.step2: Select station and view detailed information about available batteries
guide.step3: Reserve if needed to ensure battery is ready
guide.step4: Scan QR code at station to start swap process
guide.step5: Follow on-screen instructions to complete swap
guide.swapProcess.title: Swap process
guide.swapProcess.step1: Scan QR code at swap kiosk
guide.payment.title: Payment
guide.payment.single: You can buy single swaps or subscribe to swap packages
guide.payment.package: Swap packages have limited duration and swap quota
guide.payment.methods: Multiple payment methods supported: E-wallets, Bank cards
guide.payment.history: View payment history in History section
guide.description: Detailed guide on how to use the battery swap app
faq.howToSwap.question: How to swap battery?
faq.howToSwap.answer: You can find the nearest swap station on the app, scan QR code at the kiosk, and follow on-screen instructions. The system will automatically handle the swap process for you.
faq.swapTypes.question: What types of swap packages are available?
faq.swapTypes.answer: You can buy single swaps or subscribe to swap packages. Single swaps have no expiry, while swap packages have limited duration and quota depending on your chosen package.
faq.paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq.paymentMethods.answer: The app supports multiple payment methods such as e-wallets (MoMo, ZaloPay) and bank cards. All transactions are secured and encrypted.
faq.swapExpiry.question: Do swaps expire?
faq.swapExpiry.answer: Single swaps never expire, you can use them anytime. Swap packages have specific durations depending on your subscription, typically 30 days or according to package terms.
faq.viewHistory.question: Where can I view swap history?
faq.viewHistory.answer: You can view swap and payment history in the History tab on the main screen. Here you can see all transactions you've made.
terms.intro.title: 1. Introduction
terms.intro.content: By using this battery swap app, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in this document. If you do not agree with any of the terms, please do not use the service.
terms.payment.title: 4. Payment
terms.payment.content: All payment transactions are processed through secure payment gateways. You are responsible for full payment for services used. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any transaction if fraud is detected.
terms.swapCredits.title: 5. Swap Credits
terms.swapCredits.content: Swap credits can be purchased as single swaps or subscription packages. Single swaps have no expiration date. Subscription packages have a validity period and limited swaps as specified in each package. Swap credits are non-refundable after purchase.
guide.howToUse.title: How to use the app
guide.reservation.title: Reserve battery
guide.reservation.content1: Reserving battery ensures you have a battery ready when you arrive
guide.reservation.content2: You can reserve up to 30 minutes before arrival
guide.reservation.content3: Battery is held for 15 minutes after expected arrival time
guide.reservation.content4: Cancel reservation if you can't arrive on time to avoid losing credits
guide.swapProcess.step3: Open kiosk door and place old battery
guide.swapProcess.step4: Wait for system to check and charge old battery
guide.swapManagement.title: Swap management
guide.swapManagement.content1: Single swaps have no expiration, use anytime
guide.swapManagement.content2: Check remaining swaps in Swap Management section
guide.payment.invoice: Digital invoice will be sent via email
guide.safety.title: Important notes
guide.safety.content1: Always check battery before leaving station
guide.safety.content2: Report immediately if battery has issues
guide.safety.content4: Contact support if you need help
faq.reservationExpiry.question: How long is battery held after reservation?
faq.reservationExpiry.answer: Battery is held for 15 minutes after your expected arrival time. If you don't arrive within this time, the reservation will be automatically canceled.
faq.cancelReservation.question: Can I cancel reservation?
faq.cancelReservation.answer: Yes, you can cancel reservation anytime from My Reservations section. Canceling reservation will not consume your swap credits.
faq.batteryIssue.question: What to do if battery has issues?
faq.batteryIssue.answer: If you find battery issues, please report immediately through Support Request in the app. We will process and assist you as soon as possible.
faq.language.question: Does the app support multiple languages?
faq.language.answer: Yes, the app supports Vietnamese and English. You can change language in Settings section of Profile screen.
faq.contact.question: How to contact support?
faq.contact.answer: You can contact support through Support Request in the app. We will respond as soon as possible.
terms.general.title: 1. General Terms
terms.account.title: 2. User Account
terms.account.content: You are responsible for securing your account information, including password and PIN code. You must notify us immediately if you detect any suspicious activity related to your account.
terms.liability.title: 6. Liability
terms.liability.content: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the service, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages.
terms.changes.title: 8. Terms Changes
terms.changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after being published in the app. Your continued use of the service after changes means you accept the new terms.
terms.termination.title: 9. Termination
terms.termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account if you violate these terms or engage in inappropriate behavior. In this case, you will not be refunded for unused swaps.
terms.contact.title: 10. Contact
terms.contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through Support Request in the app or support email.
terms.description: Please read carefully the terms and conditions of service below. By using the app, you agree to all the terms stated.
terms.footer: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through Support Request.
helpCenter.inAppSupportDesc: Send support request directly from the app
helpCenter.noAnswer: We're always ready to help you
support.noRequestsDesc: You haven't created any support request. Press button below to create new request.
